Name: e.Designer for Photovoltaic (PV) System
Description: Be.Desinger is a planning tool for solar energy systems. It allows installer to configure the location of installation, roofs, PV to be installed on roof, select efficient inverter, and configure wiring. The system computes the energy yield of the system, return of investment and revenue form system. The system generates an output document of the plan which can be used by installer as a reference hand copy during installation
